00074 /* Type defintions __________________________________________________________ */
00075 typedef struct {                  // Counterpart candidate
00076   std::string id;                   // Unique identifier
00077   double      pos_eq_ra;            // Right Ascension (deg)
00078   double      pos_eq_dec;           // Declination (deg)
00079   double      pos_err_maj;          // Uncertainty ellipse major axis (deg)
00080   double      pos_err_min;          // Uncertainty ellipse minor axis (deg)
00081   double      pos_err_ang;          // Uncertainty ellipse positron angle (deg)
00082   double      prob;                 // Counterpart probability
00083   //
00084   long        index;                // Index of CCs in CPT catalogue
00085   double      angsep;               // Angular separation of CCs from source
00086   double      prob_angsep;          // Probability from angular separation
00087 } CCElement;
00088 
00089 class Catalogue {
00090 public:

00121 private:
